snippet: Alison Mitchell, the weekend editor of The Times, was named national editor to replace Sam Sifton, who will work on online projects.
abstract: New York Times names weekend editor Alison Mitchell as its new national editor, replacing  Sam Sifton.
lead_paragraph: Alison Mitchell, the weekend editor of The Times, was named national editor to replace Sam Sifton, who will work on online projects.

headline.main: New York Times Names a New National Editor
headline.print_headline: Times Names a New National Editor
